documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: we 've reached the end of today 's live coverage .
updates will start again at 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: weather : milder night but chance of snow
text: spells of rain this evening and for a time tonight .
the rain is then expected to clear away to the east later in the night to leave some clear spells , but also a few wintry showers .
feeling a lot less cold .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: bus stop killer wins cut in minimum jail term
text: a cyclist who stabbed a journalist to death at a bus stop has been told he can apply for earlier parole .
rickell patterson , then aged 16 , used a pocket knife to deliver a single fatal stab wound to timothy smith in nottingham in 2007 .
the teenager had been riding his bmx along the pavement and lost his temper when the 40-year-old accidentally stepped into his path .
he was found guilty of murder and jailed for life with a minimum term of 14 years , later reduced to 12 years on appeal .
now aged 27 , patterson has won a cut in his minimum term after a senior judge ruled he has made `` exceptional progress '' in prison .
the judge recommended patterson 's tariff should be reduced by nine months , which means he will be eligible to apply for parole in the summer .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: further arrest over stabbing death
text: further arrest over stabbing death

documents.title: video appeal after clubber attacked
text: an 18-year-old needed hospital treatment for head and chest injuries when he was attacked after leaving a nightclub in nottingham at the weekend .
police said the assault happened as the teenager walked along north sherwood street shortly after he had left pom pom at about 03:00 on sunday .
officers said they wanted to speak to the man in this video about the attack .
warning : third party content may contain adverts .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: rams boss calls for calm when unbeaten run ends
text: derby county boss gary rowett has said it is important not to get too upset if and when his side 's unbeaten run comes to an end .
the rams have gone 11 games without defeat since suffering a 1-0 loss to ipswich in november .
rowett could have a fully-fit squad to choose from for saturday 's championship clash with norwich .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: tesco forces elderly man to take hour-long detour
text: an elderly man was forced to make a detour of over an hour after tesco refused him entry to an alleyway .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: watch : tattoo artist 'goes against the norm '
text: leicester tattoo artist heleena mistry has been telling the bbc how she 's using her indian-inspired designs to challenge taboos .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: female elephants bid farewell to twycross zoo
text: twycross zoo is preparing to move four female elephants to take part in a breeding programme .
blackpool zoo has a bull elephant and twycross does n't have room for one so the decision was made last year to take minbu , tara , noorjahan and esha up north .
you can read more about the move here .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: road to close as police investigate fatal crash
text: part of the a515 in little cubley is to close for several hours this weekend as part of a police investigation into a fatal crash that happened there last year ,
a 60-year-old man from ashbourne was killed when his car was involved in a collision with a lorry on 20 november .
the 59-year-old lorry driver was subsequently arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving and released while investigations continued .
derbyshire police said the stretch would be closed from 16:00 on sunday with diversions put in place .
drivers are asked to avoid the area , if possible .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: children in stand-up stand-off
text: schoolchildren have been up on stage telling jokes as part of the leicester comedy festival .

documents.title: your photos : round robin in attenborough
text: a gorgeous shot - taken by david e at attenborough nature reserve .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: george formby memorabilia up for sale
text: an archive of george formby memorabilia , which was found at an east midlands car boot sale , is due to be sold .

the collection , which includes several private letters from formby and his wife beryl about the star 's famous songs , was discovered by long eaton couple rosemary and paul gregory at a sale two years ago in a nearby hotel .
mrs gregory said : my husband came across the archive and bought it for £ 25 .
now we 've decided to part with it so someone who really likes george formby can enjoy it . ''
the archive has an estimated value of £ 200-£ 300 and is due to be sold at hansons auctioneers on 27 march .
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: tigers 'not been good enough ' - o'connor
text: tigers 'not been good enough ' - o'connor

text: puel hopes mahrez 'gets his head right '

text: tea towels 'spontaneously combust '

documents.title: trio of contract extensions at nottingham rugby
text: nottingham rugby have announced contract extensions for three of their players .
centre joe cobden and scrum-half darryl veenendaal have got new one-year deals , whilst fly half/centre will millett has signed a two-year contract .
head coach neil fowkes said : `` we 're just happy that players want to stay here , it just shows the strength of the environment here and how much the players are improving and developing . ''
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: your photos : shooting the moon in chaddesden
text: we love how you can see craters in this super shot of the moon , taken in chaddesden by sassy .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: dowling named forest sporting director
text: dowling named forest sporting director

documents.title: power back on in bakewell
text: western power distribution says a power cut affecting more than 1,000 homes and businesses in the bakewell area has been resolved .
we 've now restored supplies to # derby # de45 and surrounding areas .
we apologise for any inconvenience caused by the # powercut .
geraint
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: teenager injured in masked brawl at victoria centre
text: a 19-year-old man has been arrested after another teenager was injured in a fight at nottingham 's victoria centre .
police said 10-15 people in masks were involved in the violence in and around the centre 's car park at about 16:30 yesterday .
the injured 17-year-old boy was taken to hospital but has since been released .
the 19-year-old was arrested on sus of causing grievous bodily harm and possession of an offensive weapon .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: pollution hotspots revealed
text: pollution hotspots revealed

documents.title: a50 exit closed after crash
text: something to be aware of .
# a50 # derbyshire westbound exit to the # a6 is closed due to a single vehicle collision .
@ twitterid and @ twitterid are on scene with recovery being arranged , barrier damage will need assessing .
please plan ahead if travelling this way .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: famous locks drained for winter repairs
text: famous locks drained for winter repairs

documents.title: laser shone as plane approached airport
text: a laser pen was shone at a plane as it came in to land at east midlands airport last night .
airport staff said the dhl cargo flight from belfast had managed to alight safely with no injuries .
a spokesman said : `` the aircraft was at 6,200 ft when air traffic control were informed .
`` standard procedures were followed and the police were informed . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: viaduct restoration project suffers major setback
text: plans to turn a victorian bridge that once linked nottinghamshire to derbyshire into a cycle and walking track have been put on hold .
community group friends of bennerley viaduct said charity sustrans had pulled out of backing the project , which received £ 40,000 of heritage lottery cash three years ago .
sustrans said restoring the viaduct , which runs between awsworth and ilkeston , would have cost too much and it was looking at other options .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: steep rise in east midlands knife offences
text: knife crimes have risen by almost a third in nottinghamshire , according to latest figures .
the office for national statistics said there were 750 recorded knife offences in the county in the year to march 2017 - a 29 % increase from the previous year .
the figure was 496 for leicestershire ( up 25 % ) and 403 for derbyshire ( up 14 % ) .
the total for england and wales had risen by 20 % .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: girl , 14 , arrested in teen stab probe
text: a 14-year-old girl has been arrested in connection with a fight that resulted in the stabbing of a 15-year-old boy , police have said .
the attack happened at springfield park on saturday during a pre-arranged fight among a group of 13-17 year-olds .
the arrest of the girl , on sus of possessing a bladed article , follows the arrest of a 17-year-old boy from nottingham who is now on police bail .
insp jim thompson , from derbyshire police , said : `` we would urge anyone thinking about going out carrying a knife or bladed article to think twice . ''
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: watch : foxton locks drained for winter makeover
text: foxton locks in market harborough has been drained to allow essential maintenance to be carried out .
the canal and river trust is spending £ 195,000 repairing the three tonne locks ready for the summer season .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: fewer people feel safe after dark
text: fewer people feel safe after dark in nottinghamshire , according to recent figures .
the county 's police and crime panel said an average of just 60 % of those surveyed felt safe - a fall from 74 % in previous years .
nottinghamshire police and crime commissioner paddy tipping said the figures were linked to the county 's crime rates .
he said : `` we hope to , finance permitting , increase the number of police officers over the next year . ''
author: Dominic Johnson
BBC Radio Nottingham reporter

documents.title: snow warning for friday morning
text: the met office has issued a yellow warning for snow and ice in the east midlands tomorrow .
the alert is from 00:05 to 12:00 , with heavy sleet , hail and snow showers expected through the morning .
the warning applies to derby , derbyshire , nottingham , nottinghamshire , leicester and leicestershire .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: former notts county footballer jailed
text: a former notts county footballer has been given a penalty by a judge - a jail sentence of 31 months for dealing cocaine .
author: Nottingham Post

documents.title: bmw crashes after driver nods off
text: a 78-year-old driver escaped with minor injuries after dozing off and crashing a bmw on the a50 last night .
derbyshire police said the z4 came off the road near toyota island at about 19:30 .
the driver was given a ticket for careless driving , which means he could face a fine .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: prisoner absconds from hmp sudbury
text: a convicted robber has failed to return to an open prison following a work placement , derbyshire police have said .
mathias lescott , 34 , was given temporary release from hmp sudbury yesterday but never came back .
he was convicted in march 2013 at stoke-on-trent crown court for aggravated burglary and robbery and was sentenced to 11 years and six months .
he is black , 5ft 11in tall with short black hair and is thought to have been wearing an adidas tracksuit .
lescott has connections to birmingham and stoke with his last known address also in stoke .
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: hos cash raised in memory of four-year-old
text: a leicestershire woman who raised £ 30,000 for rainbows children 's hos in memory of her son hopes the money will help other families .
ali furlong raised the money in memory of her four-year-old son william who died from lissencephaly , a rare brain condition , in june 2014 .
william spent his final 18 months in palliative care at the loughborough hos and ali said she wanted his impact on the world to continue `` to be positive '' .
`` he brought joy to our lives and i wanted that joy to continue - helping other families and being a strong family was something we could do for him , '' she said .
author: Jo Bostock
Journalist, BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: hundreds of homes hit by power cut
text: more than 1,000 homes and businesses around bakewell have been affected by a power cut .
western power distribution said it was aiming to have electricity back on by 12:30 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: pfa offer to intervene in riyad mahrez row
text: a players ' union boss has offered to act as a mediator in the ongoing dispute between riyad mahrez and leicester city .
the 26-year-old midfielder has not played for the club since a move to league leaders manchester city fell through during the january transfer window .
gordon taylor , chief executive of the professional footballers ' association , said the row needed to be sorted `` as soon as possible '' and he would be happy to assist .
he added the pfa had been in touch with both the club and the algerian midfielder .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: m1 southbound crash cleared
text: recovery work has been completed on the m1 southbound at j22 and j21a after an earlier collision that blocked two lanes .
the vehicles involved have been moved to the hard shoulder .
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: restaurant tea towel blaze prompts warning
text: a fire at a restaurant in sherwood on sunday was caused by a pile of tea towels bursting into flames after being taken out of a tumble dryer , the fire service has said .
the blaze , at crimson tree in mansfield road , has led to the fire service issuing a warning for people who regularly use the appliances .
east midlands fire investigator dave cross said : `` when you put tumble dryers on they have a cycle .
the end of that cycle is called a cool-down period .
`` when the tumble dryer 's at its hottest , if you open the door at that point and take them out , they 'll be really , really hot .
you 've got to leave them in until the tumble dryer finishes . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: bomb hoax accused claimed he actually said 'bum '
text: a man accused of telling a fellow passenger he had a bomb on a train claimed he actually said 'bum ' , a court has heard .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: lecturers to strike over pensions
text: lecturers across the east midlands are preparing to go out on strike in a row over pensions this month .
some teaching staff at the university of leicester , loughborough university and the university of nottingham are taking part in a two-week walkout from 22 february .
they say changes to their pensions schemes could mean they would be almost £ 10,000 a year worse off but universities uk said changes were necessary to make the pension scheme sustainable .

chloe vitry , from leicester university , said : `` my generation has this feeling that we 're going to have to fight for our pensions our entire lives - we might not get what our predecessors got , it feels like the first of a long battle for us . ''
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: chemical spillage test results expected
text: test results due back today on a chemical waste spill in a pond are expected to show low levels of pollution .
liquid waste containing cyanide leaked into adams pond in heanor when a container was punctured by a forklift on tuesday .

paul reeves , from the environment agency , said laboratory results should show that everything was `` generally ok '' and early indications from the field teams suggested the cyanide level in the pond was `` really low '' .
he added : `` biologists will be checking for long-term damage to insects and wildlife in the area . ''
author: Wesley Mallin
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: delays on m1 southbound after crash
text: something to bear in mind if you 're near coalville or markfield
# m1 delays southbound accident blocking two lanes between junc 22 and 21a queues are building
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: cold and cloudy start for east midlands
text: it 's a very cold start to thursday , expect more cloud and patchy rain later .
author: Rich Davis
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: traffic across the east midlands
text: - m1 southbound and northbound between j23 and j23a ( east midlands airport ) are heavily congested due to roadworks , two lanes are closed southbound with traffic building .
- the a6 at milford is slow due to temporary traffic lights , both lanes affected .
- m1 southbound at j25 ( sandiacre ) is also congested due to roadworks .
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News

documents.title: join us for our live coverage
text: hello and good morning .
gavin bevis and myself will once again be writing the updates on today 's live page with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us , you can send an email , or use facebook or twitter .
author: Chris Fawcett
BBC News
